snippet: The police in Xinjiang, the far-western Chinese region beset by ethnic tensions, fatally shot one person and captured another on Thursday, state-run media reported on Thursday.
abstract: Police in Xinjiang, China, reportedly shoot one person to death and capture another; clash comes just over a week after two attackers with explosives and knives killed one person and wounded at least 79 others outside train station in Urumqi.
lead_paragraph: The police in Xinjiang, the far-western Chinese region beset by ethnic tensions, fatally shot one person and captured another on Thursday, state-run media reported on Thursday.

headline.main: Police in Deadly Confrontation in Restive Chinese Region
headline.print_headline: China: Police in West Region Confront Militants in Another Deadly Clash
